parameters.name: AddressIpVersion
parameters.description:
The protocol version. Valid values:

*   **ipv4**: IPv4
*   **DualStack**: dual stack

parameters.name: AddressType
parameters.description:
The type of IPv4 address used by the NLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Internet**: The NLB instance uses a public IP address. The domain name of the NLB instance is resolved to the public IP address. Therefore, the NLB instance can be accessed over the Internet.
*   **Intranet**: The NLB instance uses a private IP address. The domain name of the NLB instance is resolved to the private IP address. Therefore, the NLB instance can be accessed over the VPC where the NLB instance is deployed.

parameters.name: DNSName
parameters.description: The domain name of the NLB instance.

parameters.name: Ipv6AddressType
parameters.description:
The type of IPv6 address used by the NLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Internet**: a public IP address. The domain name of the NLB instance is resolved to the public IP address. Therefore, the NLB instance can be accessed over the Internet.
*   **Intranet**: a private IP address. The domain name of the NLB instance is resolved to the private IP address. Therefore, the NLB instance can be accessed over the VPC where the NLB instance is deployed.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerBusinessStatus
parameters.description:
The business status of the NLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Abnormal**: The NLB instance is not working as expected.
*   **Normal**: The NLB instance is working as expected.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerIds
parameters.description: The ID of the NLB instance. You can query up to 20 NLB instances at a time.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerNames
parameters.description: The name of the NLB instance. You can specify up to 20 names at a time.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the NLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Inactive**: The NLB instance is disabled. Listeners of NLB instances in the Inactive state do not forward traffic.
*   **Active**: The NLB instance is running.
*   **Provisioning**: The NLB instance is being created.
*   **Configuring**: The NLB instance is being modified.
*   **Deleting**: The NLB instance is being deleted.
*   **Deleted**: The NLB instance is deleted.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerType
parameters.description: The type of the Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance. Set the value to **network**, which specifies NLB.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that determines the start point of the next query. Valid values:

*   If this is your first query and no subsequent queries are to be sent, ignore this parameter.
*   If a subsequent query is to be sent, set the parameter to the value of NextToken that is returned from the last call.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the NLB instance is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~443657~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the NLB instance.

parameters.name: VpcIds
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) where the NLB instance is deployed. You can specify up to 10 VPC IDs at a time.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The name of the zone. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~443890~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
